name: getbycordsadv
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool electric_vehicle_charging_stations.
Tool description: Designed to provide users with the ability to search for and locate electric vehicle charging stations. The API includes a vast database of over 50,000 charging stations, with more being added regularly.
API description: Fetch nearby electric vehicle charging stations based on given latitude and longitude coordinates.

radius.description: Radius in miles within which to search for charging stations.

lat.description: Latitude coordinate for the search center.

lng.description: Longitude coordinate for the search center.

access_param.description: Type of access for the charging stations (e.g., 'public', 'private'). Defaults to 'public'.

ev_connector_type_param.description: Type of EV connector (e.g., 'J1772'). Defaults to 'J1772'.

ev_network_param.description: EV network providers to include in the search (e.g., 'Tesla,Tesla Destination'). Defaults to 'Tesla,Tesla Destination'.

per_page.description: Number of results to return per page. Defaults to 10.

page.description: Number of results to return per page. Defaults to 10.

owner_type_param.description: Type of owner for the charging stations (e.g., 'all'). Defaults to 'all'.
